monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: For every different type of Debuff on an enemy Monster, it deals 2.5% less damage and takes 2.5% more damage.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Congeal
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill (Debuff) deals damage to enemies at the start of their turn based on their missing Mana.

skills.name: Cooling
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Crit Damage Focus
skills.description: Critical Damage values from equipment increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Debuff Variety
skills.description: Aura: For every different type of Debuff on an enemy Monster, it deals 2.5% less damage and takes 2.5% more damage.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Dexterity
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Dexterity Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Dexterity Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Glory & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Fatal Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Poison, Burn and Congeal damage dealt to enemies is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Fire Pillar
skills.description: 3 x 200% (600%) magical damage (fire) applies Sorcery, Regeneration & Spellshield (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Flamestrike
skills.description: 1 x 130% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 225% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 290% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Glorious Spark
skills.description: Unique Aura: Allied Monsters with Glory trigger an additional 40% damage hit. Additional stacks of Glory increase the damage by an additional 20%.

skills.name: Glory
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gravity
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Base Damage is increased by 2 x 10% for every health and defense rating of the target

skills.name: Hades
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff) or Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Initial Burn
skills.description: Apply Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Physical Resistance
skills.description: Physical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Spectral Cannon
skills.description: 1 x 375% magical damage (neutral) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Spectral Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 450% magical damage (neutral) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Spectral Flame
skills.description: 3 x 70% (210%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 80% (320%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 105% (420%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 105% (525%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Wave
skills.description: 1 x 180% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 240% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Trickster Spirit
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Spirit Monster in the party applies a Buff or a Debuff, it is shielded by 3% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Vicious
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 40% chance to gain Glory (Buff).

drops.name: Phoenix Tear
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 4 x 200
